title: Free RP

replies.body:
By any chance did you participate in the recent [Star Guardian contest](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/JW9EyT1Y-star-guardian-invasion-contest)? 

A few people that were missed out in the initial wave of prizing should be receiving their RP now.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=uj3J3Mwj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T23:10:59.842+0000)
>
> By any chance did you participate in the recent [Star Guardian contest](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/JW9EyT1Y-star-guardian-invasion-contest)? 
> 
> A few people that were missed out in the initial wave of prizing should be receiving their RP now.

Yes I did, but I received that reward a few weeks ago. The top prize was 1000RP, but in this case I happened to get 1300/1400RP.
By chance have you changed your name between now and the contest? It could be confusion with summ name, but your name isn't appearing on any of our lists.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=uj3J3Mwj,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-27T02:53:46.554+0000)
>
> By chance have you changed your name between now and the contest? It could be confusion with summ name, but your name isn't appearing on any of our lists.

Yeah, I changed my name from Shøckwave to µtopia after I had submitted my entrance. If it was a confusion with summoner names, I would have received 1000RP, being the top prize for the contest (getting a S+), but I happened to received 1300/1400RP instead.

Ah okie dokie. Unlikely the second amount was related to the contest then, any chance it was a gift you missed? I think they only appear on the little bell in the top right now. Past that, your best bet is to submit a support ticket enquiring where the extra RP came from, since they'll be able to see the source :)
